channel.title: Changing text on interface
channel.description:
So the last Rule on the report player interface is missing, instead it repeats the "moderator option" thing. I'm trying to replace that text with the actual rule which is "13: Asking for personal details"
this is what i have and it isn't working.
[code=java5]getPA().sendFrame126("13: Asking for personal details", 14605);[/code]
This is located within the initialize method, this method is called when a player logs in, it sets stats, equipment, inventory, bank, etc.

item.title: Changing text on interface
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

[quote=“matzie, post:4, topic:542350”][quote author=Docent link=topic=661226.msg4420061#msg4420061 date=1398006212]

are you sure that’s the correct child id?

100% sure because it works on my RuneSource server
[/quote]
modify your client to output the ID’s of their interfaces.
so textString = parentID+""
what ever your values are in your revision. The hard part is figuring out which is which and if your cache is different, there could be different lines added[/quote]

I fixed it. It was a client sided issue.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing text on interface
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

[quote=“Docent, post:3, topic:542350”][quote author=Int Bauk link=topic=661226.msg4420046#msg4420046 date=1397996125]
are you sure that’s the correct child id?
[/quote]
100% sure because it works on my RuneSource server[/quote]
modify your client to output the ID’s of their interfaces.
so textString = parentID+""
what ever your values are in your revision. The hard part is figuring out which is which and if your cache is different, there could be different lines added

Read full topic
